Man situation. Submission of Maris is so far advanced that General Officer Commanding Duki Force proposes shortly to announce terms which will include reparation of damage done, confiscation of muafis and temporary raising of revenue on.revenue paying lands.It is intended that Mari country should then be evacuated, hostages being taken to ensure due compliance with the terms.Health of troops is very good.I
